itemLabel: Clare Mountbatten, Marchioness of Milford Haven
itemDescription: British journalist and aristocrat; wife of George Mountbatten, 4th Marquess of Milford Haven

wikipedia_page.main: Clare Husted Mountbatten, Marchioness of Milford Haven (née Steel; born 2 September 1960), is a British aristocrat, journalist and polo player. She held the position of Social Editor for Tatler magazine from 1995 to 2005. She is the co-founder and trustee of James' Place, a charity dedicated to prevent male suicide. She founded the organisation with Nick Wentworth-Stanley, following the tragic loss by suicide of their son, James.

response: #REDIRECT Clare Mountbatten, Marchioness of Milford Haven
* Clare Mountbatten, Marchioness of Milford Haven (b. 1960), second wife of George Mountbatten, 4th Marquess of Milford Haven (m. 1997)
